reference.shortdesc: A title hint provides information to map authors about the title of the referenced resource.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Title hints are intended to provide the title of referenced resources to map authors when the title may not be immediately accessible. It is not rendered as part of the publication.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The titlehint element is a specialization of titlealt with the title-role set to hint. Processing is dictated by the rules for titlealt.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The titlehint element is specialized from titlealt. It is defined in the alternativeTitle-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , class, outputclass, and the title-role attribute set to hint.

example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how the titlehint element can be used.
